title.rendered: HSP LoadSlide Dual Cab – Nissan Navara Np300 Facelift 2021+

content.rendered:
HSP LoadSlide Dual Cab – Nissan Navara Np300 Facelift 2021+

The ultimate solution for easy access to the contents of your vehicles tub. Easily operated via a simple handle with multiple latching positions and a purpose built side rail. Built using heavy-duty steel and topped with a precision cut platform to wrap around the wheel arches.

(Please note: this unit only fits the Nissan Np300 2015-2021. The New 2021 Np300 will not suit this product. HSP will release products for the 2021+ Np300 between April-June of 2021)

– Powder Coated steel frame
– Spring-loaded latch pins allow you to position the tray into multiple positions
– 75% extension
– 250 kgs loading capacity (dispersed weight extended)
– Compatible with most bed/tub liners
– Precision cut platform
